name: The Idiot's Tale
description: Can you find all three treasures and save the day? Or are you just gonna run away like an idiot?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or higher Processor: Dual Core 2GHz or higher Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: AMD or Nvidia video card DirectX: Version 8.0 Storage: 400 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX-compatible sound card
